name: Tour of the Mage
description:
Help mage find his long lost book of everlasting life. In his way would be kingdom of Limandia that is protecting it at all cost.

Could you take back your long lost book? Or the mage will horribly die of old age?

Controls:

Move:  A/Left arrow  ,    D/Right arrow

Jump: Spacebar

Shooting fireballs: Left mouse
